text:
xindice-embed lc -c xmldb:xindice-embed:///db works fine, also
xindice-embed lc -c xmldb:xindice-embed://localhost:8090/db (where my Tomcat is 
running).
But
xindice-embed lc -c xmldb:xindice-embed://localhost:8091/db and all other arbitrary port 
numbers are accepted as well and provide the right result.

creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
text:
You're using the xmldb:xindice-embed version to access a database via xmlrpc. 
This certainly cannot work.

Try :

   xindice lc -c /db
   xindice lc -c localhost:8090/db
   xindice lc -c localhost:8091/db
